entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is the Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher who is standing in front of Harry Potter. She has stubby-fingered hands and is leaning towards them.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student who is being spoken to by Professor Umbridge. He is angry and argues with her about the return of a Dark wizard.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge scolds Harry Potter for making matters worse for himself by arguing about the return of a Dark wizard.
